casebody.data:
CITY OF BURLINGTON
v.
PUBLISHERS. No. 518PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 23, 2005. Robert M. Ward, Burlington, for City of Burlington. Hugh Stevens, Raleigh, for Boney Publishers. Andrew L. Romanet, Jr., Gregory F. Schwitzgebel, III, Raleigh, for N.C. League of Municipalities. John A. Bussian, Mark J. Prak, Raleigh, for Press and Broadcasters. *139Julia F. Youngman, Raleigh, for Am. Civil Liberties Union of NC. Robert N. Hunter, Jr., Greensboro, for John Locke Foundation.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of March 2005 by Plaintiff for Leave to File a Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed. By order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of March 2005."
